overview: Adam Caine and Kylie White are the ultimate power couple, or so it would seen. But there is trouble brewing in their oh-so-perfect lives. Kylie, a mega superstar and Adam, a not so famous soap stud, find themselves entwined in high profile love triangles and torrid back stage trysts that leave the press and their adoring fans in a scandalous frenzy, and that's when the fur really begins to fly, Kylie accuses Adam of wonton infidelity as Adam answers her allegations with stories of her scorching hot Missy Pierson to air their personal grievances, but Missy has a nasty little sexual agenda of her own as the players find themselves spiraling downward into the depths of a world of sex, lies and those who sin.
tagline: Crazy In Love. Deadly In Bed.
title: Sweetheart
